alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Bath (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 3:17AM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around a tenth of an inch, with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Alleghany VA and Bath Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads and sidewalks will become slick and hazardous. Bridges and overpasses will be most susceptible to ice.
info.instruction: Plan on poor travel conditions. Reduce speed and allow extra time to reach your destination. Postpone travel if possible. The public is encouraged to report snow...sleet or ice amounts to the National Weather Service via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov...through Facebook or Twitter...or by calling 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Pictures are greatly appreciated. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
